EmailTemplate.name: FMS 6.1 Webinar Invitation.FMS 6.1 Webinar Invitation Letter
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell FMZ-2000 6.1 Software Upgrade Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> FMZ-2000 6.1 SOFTWARE UPGRADE WEBINAR Please join us... Date Tuesday, November 28, 2017
Time 8-9 AM MST (Arizona) / 10-11 AM EST
You are invited to the upcoming Honeywell FMZ-2000 6.1 Software Upgrade Webinar.
This webinar will provide an overview of the new FMS 6.1 upgrade features, benefits and capabilities. These upgrades improve flight safety, on-time performance and fuel efficiency while also making the FMZ-2000 easier than ever for pilots to use.
All pilots and operators of aircraft with the FMZ-2000 cockpit should attend.
Please RSVP by November 22.
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/FMS6.1WebinarInvitation_201707_Global_Landing_eChartsWebinar_rw.html]]>
